title: Turkey ramps up its purge of Kurdish fighters
text:
Turkey ramps up its purge of Kurdish fighters 5:39pm GMT - 01:28 
President Tayyip Erdogan has vowed to press an offensive against Kurdish YPG fighters along the length of Turkey’s border with Syria and if necessary into northern Iraq. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
President Tayyip Erdogan has vowed to press an offensive against Kurdish YPG fighters along the length of Turkey’s border with Syria and if necessary into northern Iraq. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2pp06E6
